task_summary: Navigate a mobile platform down a hallway to the named goal and verify arrival.

task_long_description.overview: The scene shows a long indoor hallway with carpeted floor and beige walls, likely in Cory Hall. The camera progresses forward with the corridor subtly curving/rightward, culminating near a brighter doorway or endpoint. The robot must navigate to a named location "goal" and confirm arrival. There are no manipulable objects; the task is pure navigation. The BT attempts navigation repeatedly with a time-bounded action and finishes only when the goal is reached.
preconditions: Robot localization available to reference a named location 'goal'.
Hallway is traversable with no blocking obstacles.
Wheel odometry and basic safety limits active.
stepwise_plan: Check if already at the goal.
If not, execute a NavigateToNamed action toward 'goal' with nominal yaw.
Repeat navigation until success within capped attempts.
Verify final position at the goal.
success_criteria: No collision or unsafe behavior during transit.
failure_and_recovery: If navigation times out or planner fails, automatically retry up to 3 attempts.
If repeated timeouts persist, the tree returns failure for higher-level handling.
task_long_description.termination: Tree returns SUCCESS once IsAt(target='goal') is true after navigation.

frame_3.now_evidence: Hallway centerline and vanishing point are clear, indicating forward progress toward the endpoint.
frame_3.predicts_next: Further forward motion is expected; the geometry suggests continuing the same heading.

node_specs.description: Checks if the robot is at a symbolic target location.
Navigation to a named map waypoint with yaw setpoint and timeout.
Retries its child until success or attempts are exhausted.
Runs children in order until one fails.
Succeeds if any child succeeds; otherwise fails.

failure_modes: Localization drift prevents meeting IsAt tolerance.
Path planner cannot find a path due to unseen obstacle.
recovery_strategy: Retry navigation up to 3 times with a brief dwell between attempts.
Escalate to higher-level replan if BT returns failure.
assumptions: 'goal' corresponds to the bright hallway endpoint seen in later frames.
No dynamic obstacles requiring additional perception actions.
Instruction aligns with frames showing corridor traversal.

expected_success_criteria: Final IsAt(target='goal') becomes true after navigation.
